markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 383 2.0 **Duration** 1 minute --- Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature, which you select from the list below each time you Cast the Spell.
  • **Cat Eyes** You gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416).
  • **Claws** You gain a claw attack that deals 1d6 slashing damage and has the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits.
  • **Jaws** You gain a jaws attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage and has the [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) trait.
--- **Heightened (4th)** Add the following options to the list.
  • **Fish Tail** You gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed.
  • **Owl Eyes** You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
  • **Wings** You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
name: Animal Feature
